name: Meta 3D Studios
tagline: An apps and game development company in Austin
description:
Meta 3D Studios, founded in 2005, is an application and game development company in Austin, Texas that creates custom-branded interactive experiences for clients, including Discovery Channel, Mattel, and Syfy. We have completed hundreds of projects, large and small, for groups and individuals across the world. Be our next awesome client. Relationships are more important to us than making a quick dollar.
Many of our clients decide to start with a smaller project when we are getting to know one another. Once we have earned their trust and respect, we move into larger projects. Meta 3D Studios has many long-term clients that bring return or referral business. We want to be considered as a partner in your long-term success.
READ MORE...
